#include <stdio.h>
int main()
{
	int count=0;
	int flag=0;
	int m,n;
	int a,b;
	while (1)
	{
		scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
		count=0;
		flag=0;
		if(a==0&&b==0)
			break;
		else
		{
			
			while(a>0||b>0)
			{
				m=a%10;
				n=b%10;
				a=a/10;
				b=b/10;
				if(m+n+flag>=10)
				{
					flag=1;
					count++;
				}
				else
					flag=0;
			}
			if(count==0)
				printf("No carry operation.\n");
			else if(count==1)
				printf("1 carry operation.\n");
			else
				printf("%d carry operations.\n",count);
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
